structure:Codelist.common:Name: Greek Economic Sub-Sector Classification
structure:Codelist.common:Description: Classification of economic sub-sector categories providing detailed breakdown of economic activities within broader sector groupings for labor force statistics.

structure:Code.common:Name: Not applicable
structure:Code.common:Description: Not applicable to the data or special processing code.

structure:Code.common:Name: Tertiary sector total
structure:Code.common:Description: Total for all tertiary sector activities including services, trade, and public administration.

structure:Code.common:Name: Secondary sector total
structure:Code.common:Description: Total for all secondary sector activities including manufacturing, construction, and utilities.

structure:Code.common:Name: Agriculture, forestry and fishing
structure:Code.common:Description: Primary economic activities including crop production, animal husbandry, forestry, and fishing.

structure:Code.common:Name: Industry including energy
structure:Code.common:Description: Industrial activities including manufacturing and energy production and distribution.

structure:Code.common:Name: Construction
structure:Code.common:Description: Construction activities including building construction, civil engineering, and specialized construction activities.

structure:Code.common:Name: Trade, hotels and restaurants, transport and communication
structure:Code.common:Description: Commercial activities including wholesale and retail trade, accommodation and food services, transportation, and communication.

structure:Code.common:Name: Financial, real estate, renting and business activities
structure:Code.common:Description: Financial services, real estate activities, and business support services.

structure:Code.common:Name: Other service activities
structure:Code.common:Description: Other service activities not covered by other categories, including public administration, education, health, and social work.

structure:Code.common:Name: Did not answer
structure:Code.common:Description: Respondents who did not answer the sub-sector question.
